articles.title: What Is Monkeypox, and How Worried Should Americans Be? - The Suburban Newspaper
articles.description: MONDAY, May 23, 2022 (HealthDay News) -- A worrisome international outbreak of monkeypox, a less harmful cousin of the smallpox virus, has now reached the United States and Canada. As of Saturday, 92 confirmed cases of the illness, and 28 more suspected cases…

articles.title: 'American Idol' winner Noah Thompson reflects on life-changing journey - USA TODAY
articles.description: USA TODAY caught up with Noah Thompson about an hour after his emotional "American Idol" win. He tells us what's next.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES – Less than two hours after winning"American Idol," Noah Thompson barely has time to sit and eat, let alone check his phone.
